sentences.en: ...the author of one or two opera librettos.
Opera in three acts by G. Puccini , Libretto by G. Giacosa and L. Illica.
sentences.cn: 三幕歌剧:G. 普契尼作曲;G. 贾柯查和L. 伊里卡编剧.

sentences.en: The printed libretto was handsomely got up.
sentences.cn: 这本印刷的歌剧剧本装帧得很美观.

trans.tran_en: the words of an opera or musical play
